Enter the battleground with the PUBG-themed live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A dynamic interface inspired by the intense and action-packed world of PUBG.

🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Easily navigate to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into action with PUBG-inspired games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Amplify your browsing experience with tools designed for PUBG enthusiasts.
